title: Father joins his tiny daughter on stage to partner her at a dance show
text:
This is the adorable moment that a proud father dances with his daughter during her dance recital, to the delight of a cheering crowd.

The footage, taken by an audience member during a dance show in South Africa, shows the father-daughter duo expertly take on the beautifully choreographed routine.

It begins with them standing at either end of the stage and performing synchronized somersaults before the little girl wearing a yellow dress runs and jumps into her father's arms as he lifts her up into the air.

The little girl wearing a yellow dress runs across the stage and jumps into her father's arms as he lifts her up into the air (pictured) during the routine in South Africa

The routine - set to the song Why I Love You by Major - continues with the pair cartwheeling across the stage prompting more applause from the crowd.

The dance partners then walk slowly towards each other before the father twirls her round.

He then pulls her onto his shoulder in an impressive lift before she flips back onto the ground.

Next he picks her back up and twirls around with her legs in the splits.

The father then breaks off on his own performing a series of pirouettes causing the crowd to laugh and cheer.

He then pulls her onto his shoulder in an impressive lift before she flips back onto the ground and he picks her back up and twirls around with her legs in the splits (pictured)

The sweet video shared on Twitter was watched by over 146,000 people, with users commenting on the adorable bond between the pair

At the end of the dance the two of them embrace in a sweet hug before they take a bow and skip off stage.

The heart-warming video shared on Twitter was watched by over 146,000 people.

One user commented: 'She's going to always remember this too. I hope I can give my children special memories like this one.'

Another said: 'Awwww! I love to see daddy daughter relationships! She'll remember this forever.'
